title: Press Mat For Industrial Lamination Process, "Copsil Gold™ Press Mat", designed 1994, manufactured 2005
medium:
Medium: brass, copper, silicone
Technique: herringbone twill weave
dimensions: Maximum available width: 300 cm (9 ft. 10 1/8 in.)
description: Woven herringbone twill of brass wire warp and silicone-covered copper wire weft maximizes heat transfer through the press mat, while equalizing the pressure being applied to the laminate and preventing shifting of the mat during the lamination process.
